item.title: CV
item.description:
Andrew “Drew” Thomas

Glendale, CA | drew.thomas@comcast.net | 720-360-5359

Education

California Polytechnic State University - San Luis Obispo, CA

Bachelor of Science degree in Electrical Engineering Spring 2024

GPA: 3.320 Dean’s List: Winter 2021, Fall 2023

Relevant Coursework:

  • Electronic Design
  • Discrete Time Filters and Digital Signal Processing
  • Analog Filter Design
  • Microcontroller based Systems Design
  • Antennae, and Transmission Lines
  • Semiconductor Electronics with Digital & Analog Applications
  • Control Systems and Discrete/Continuous Signals
  • Digital Design and Assembly Programming

Research Interests

  • Analog & Mixed Signal Design RF Electronics
  • Signal Integrity & Signal Processing Photonics
  • Digital Signal Processing Filter Design

Work Experience

Abbott Laboratories - Test Development Engineer

Sylmar, CA
